title: nf-core/funcscan pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fasta.errorMessage: Fasta file for reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension `.fa.gz`, `.fna.gz` or `.fasta.gz`

protein.errorMessage: Input file for peptide annotations has incorrect file format. File must end in `.fasta` or `.faa`

gbk.errorMessage: Input file for feature annotations has incorrect file format. File must end in `.gbk.gz` or `.gbff.gz`
